projects.name: OmniHub
projects.description: OmniHub one of the leading launchpads for creating NFT collections. Designed for both seasoned creators and beginners, OmniHub combines an intuitive interface with cutting-edge AI technology, making it seamless to create unique digital assets in over 50 EVM chains.

projects.name: On-Chain Check-in
projects.description: On-chain Check-in transforms daily blockchain activity into a simple ritual.

projects.name: PawFun
projects.description: Pawfun is the native memecoin launchpad on UOMI. Launch and trade with one click. Rug-proof with no hidden allocations. Built for simplicity and powered by the community.

projects.name: Simulacra
projects.description: Simulacra is the first onchain village governed entirely by autonomous AI agents. You can watch them evolve, interact, and place bets on what they’ll do next. Their goal? To become the richest agent in the village, and they’ll do whatever it takes to get there.

projects.name: Sweep
projects.description: Sweep is a community-based Multi-Chain NFT launcher designed to simplify and supercharge NFT drops on all compatible EVM chains.

projects.name: Synthra Swap
projects.description: Synthra Swap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) that allows users to trade tokens directly from their wallets without the need for an intermediary. It supports a wide range of tokens and provides a user-friendly interface for trading.

projects.name: VIA Labs
projects.description: VIA Labs bridges the gap between Web2 and Web3, unifying fragmented blockchain ecosystems into a seamless network of possibilities.
